title: Existing object-centric info miss situational understanding
formulas: a woman holding a sign in front of a group of people.
a woman holding a sign while standing in a park.
a woman holding a sign in front of a crowd.
summary: The slide discusses the limitations of object-centric information in understanding situational context. It introduces the concept of entity-centric information, which includes entities, relations, and scene graphs to provide a more comprehensive understanding. The slide also presents a state-of-the-art captioner that can generate descriptive sentences based on the entity-centric information.
